description: OpenID Provider Configuration, described by OpenID Connect Core 1.0. Fields are defined by the OpenID Provider Metadata.

issuer.description: The issuer of OIDC tokens and claims.

authorization_endpoint.description: URL of the Synapse OAuth 2.0 Authorization Endpoint

token_endpoint.description: URL of the Synapse OAuth 2.0 Token Endpoint

revocation_endpoint.description: URL of the Synapse OAuth 2.0 Revocation Endpoint

userinfo_endpoint.description: URL of the Synapse UserInfo Endpoint

jwks_uri.description: URL of the Synapse JSON Web Key Set [JWK] document.

registration_endpoint.description: URL of the Synapse Dynamic Client Registration Endpoint

scopes_supported.description: List of the OAuth 2.0 scope values that Synapse supports.

response_types_supported.description: List of the OAuth 2.0 response types that Synapse supports.

grant_types_supported.description: List of the OAuth 2.0 grant types that Synapse supports.

subject_types_supported.description: List of the subject identified types that Synapse supports.

id_token_signing_alg_values_supported.description: List of the JWS signing algorithms (alg values) supported by Synapse for the ID Token to encode the Claims in a JWT

userinfo_signing_alg_values_supported.description: List of the JWS signing algorithms (alg values) supported by the UserInfo Endpoint to encode the Claims in a JWT

claims_supported.description: List of the Claim Names of the Claims that the Synapse MAY be able to supply values for.

service_documentation.description: URL of a page containing human-readable information that developers might want or need to know when using Synapse.

claims_parameter_supported.description: Boolean value specifying whether Synapse supports use of the claims parameter, with true indicating support.

token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported.description: a list of Client Authentication methods supported by Synapse's Token Endpoint. See OpenID Connect Core 1.0 Client Authentication
